svg.title: Choke-Input Filter: Critical Inductance
svg.text: For full-wave, approximate critical inductance: Lc ≈ Rload / (3π f)
Example: Rload = 1 kΩ, f = 50 Hz → Lc ≈ 1000 / (3π · 50) ≈ 2.1 H
Design note: choose L ≥ Lc to maintain continuous current.
(Actual ripple depends on L, C, load, and rectifier characteristics.)
